Entries.default: "Don't go getting yourself burned."
"These creatures are essence twisted to ill use. Watch yourself."
"Blights. Gird yourself against extremes of heat and cold."
"Be on your guard, captain. The air is charged like the sea before a storm."
"We could do a lot worse than put these things out of their misery."
"Aw, Hel, those poor souls."
"Spiritual essence given elemental form. Be on your guard."
"This is the first fight? Is it too late to leave?"
"The concentrated anger and frustration of many lifetimes... I like them already."
"Think I'll leave the fiery one to you."
"I do not care what we fight, so long as it will take a hit."
"Look at that! Shining and jumping like a ship ablaze!"
"Think you can talk our way out of this, too?"
"I don't suppose we could talk them down?"
"Their lack of legs means there's fewer limbs to remove."
"Time to avenge Mairu on these beasts!"
"Set me loose on them, captain. I've got a reckoning in mind for these Deadfire snakes."
"Slither on over here if you think you can take me!"
"Let's see who here be the bigger snake!"
"Disgusting. Let us freeze them and be done with it."
"I don't care to get any closer to the wriggling fiends than this."
"Don't let the scaly bastards behind ya!"
"If they are snakes, why do they have arms?"
"Look at 'em wiggle! Almost hate to kill 'em..."
"Hey there, old man. Long time no see."
"This brings back unpleasant memories."
"I hope that you have learned a thing or two since last you faced this foe."
"Captain, explain to me again what you intend to prove by murdering an old man a second time?"
"Kana never mentioned that you stole Caed Nua from an old man. I'm sorry I missed that."
"Sure he's just a phantasm, but is there some reason we're going to beat up this old man?"
"Ain't no old salt saltier than a dead old salt."
"Do not be distracted, Watcher. Distraction kills."
"Let us kill the old man and be done with this."
"Captain, you go to interesting lengths to defend your reputation."
"Hold on, are you sure this is right?"
"You want we should kill this old man? Watcher?"
"Look at him! He's like a frail old flag he is! Let's burn him!"
"Is it wrong of me to pretend he's Hiravias?"
"If there is bloodletting to happen, let it not be ours."
"You should never have stepped into the arena, little man."
"Let us teach these students what it means to be an alpha predator."
"I almost feel sorry for this bunch. Almost."
"Time to make good on my promise."
"Careful, cap! Him being short don't mean he ain't mean!"
"I'd always heard that the people of Ixamitl prized intellect and wisdom. Oh, did they banish you?"
"Do you think they have any idea what is about to happen to them?"
"He is very bold for someone so... small."
"You should run away, little man. Maybe join the pirates."
"At least he's not Skaen, with the weeping sores and pus and all. Though I suppose he could be, if he wanted."
"We should count ourselves lucky it's chosen the shape of a god and not one of us."
"I will consider this practice."
"Captain, if this Changeling were to change into one of us, how would you tell us apart?"
"I'm not sure you should be taking on the shape of a god."
"Come on, cap. We've killed hornier."
"Ah, yes. Let us fight another god-shaped beast."
"Has it changed yet? Would we even know for sure?"
"How's that for a trick?"
"It wears one of the many faces of God..."
"Ha! Look at what he's wearing!"
"Do you feel them, too? The bits of souls all smashed together?"
"Their souls are bright, like kith's!"
"His soul's like an echo coming from far away."
"His soul burns so bright. Let's snuff it out."
"No matter what shape it takes, it can't hide its soul."
"Ready, Watcher? Not that you've got a lot of choice in the matter."
"Fye, lat's hae't out, than!"
"For the Republics!"
"Let me know where you want me, captain. I am ready."
"Ready when you are, captain."
"Got my sickle sharpened for the harvest."
"Ain't normally one for exhibitionism, but let's be giving them a show, aye?!"
"Your end shall be slow and painful!"
"Time to put what I learned from Arkemyr to the test."
"Don't get cocky!"
"Tell me what to hit!"
"Drinks after, aye?"
"Everything's got a soul."
"Winner's the one that blinds the most eyes, Maia. The thing's got eyes, aye?"
"Hey Serafen, want to make this interesting? Whoever dies first has to haunt the captain."
"Mas yaw likez Yiz ssudaget' t'ese?"
"Ke ni tehun seliki hidu gawu."
"I've got your back, Fassina!"
"Caution will serve us better than speed!"
